title: DPM Dar expresses deep concern over Gaza’s worsening situation
content:
ISLAMABAD, June 14 (APP):  Deputy Prime Minister/Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar Saturday expressed deep concern over the worsening humanitarian situation in Gaza and West Bank, resulting from Israel’s blatant violations of human rights.
The DPM/FM chaired a high-level meeting to review the status of ongoing assistance provided by Pakistan to the Palestinian people, Foreign Office Spokesperson said in a press release.
Reaffirming Pakistan’s unwavering moral, political, and diplomatic support for the Palestinian cause, Dar emphasized on the need to enhance the provision of humanitarian relief to the Palestinian people as well as to extend educational assistance to the Palestinian students.
